Text: Myself, I'm not downloading this. To many things removed. The only thing that should've been removed was the warnings, everything else should've been left alone.
@sexyjvs all that stuff waz removed so it could fit on a blank DVD.. if it waznt removed it would of been 7.5 GiB..
Still, let us choose what we want. Thank You.
@trin02 thnkz 4 telling me that but im not defending him.. im jus sayin thatz probably y he removed all that stuff but i kno u were talking 2 BOW..

Why BOW has to defend himself?If you don't like the release-find some better or just go get it from the store,but you have to spend some money on that,and here is totally free.Be more appreciative,because BOW whoever he is -is spending his free time here for you. And about the all language comments-keep it for yourself ,don't complain or go spend 20 bucks on the original DVD,I don't think some of you will do that.
